Posts.Content: Hi I just used to get up and watch recorded programmes or knit then sleep during the day until the steriods wore off then started to be normal then it was back to no sleeping. X
Posts.Title: Sleepless Nights

Posts.Content: Hi Yes you should have it checked out. Have you had any pins and needles? It does sound like neuropathy These side effects are worse than the op. Take care. Sending  a hug.
Posts.Title: Numb toes

Posts.Content: Thank you ladies.
Posts.Title: how long for bone scan results

Posts.Content: Hi I forgot to ask how long results would take. I had a bone scan on Monday. X
Posts.Title: how long for bone scan results

Posts.Content: Sending you warm thoughts and a big hug. I will go have a whisky with your dad. Xx
Posts.Title: Good news and bad.!!

Posts.Content: Afternoon glad your getting sorted. But try and keep your sprits up. How many more sessions do you have to go? Hope your mum goes on all right. Xx
Posts.Title: Good news and bad.!!

Posts.Content: Hope your feeling more postie I finished chemo in march. It wasn't plesent but got through. Did not need radio. Found that complementary therapies helped.

Posts.Content: What a good idea really thoughtful. Any in bradford. Skipton or Leeds?
Posts.Title: Pamper Cancer, East Sussex

Posts.Content: Thank you I have been to feel good looking great. It was great now I am getting hair now and to get advise 're the hair would be good. Thank for looking for me.
Posts.Title: Pamper Cancer, East Sussex

Posts.Content: Just think of the light at the end of the tunel.  Sending you a hug x
Posts.Title: Starting out......

Posts.Content: Hi I found a site on line called AnaOno 'll  I found it on line a it was started by a lady who had a mastectomy It is over in America
Posts.Title: Pretty post mastectomy bras????

Posts.Content: Hi It doesn't sink in straight away and all I wanted was my breast off and get rid of the thing. You have a plan and I focused on that, waiting is hard, for results in some ways things are happening fast and in others it's seems slow. Why can't they tell me straight away? But they can't. I am a year further down the line than you I had my mastectomy September last year.  This site is a good one I only discovered after treatment but whilst your going through it there are a lot of support that people on here give. Hope all goes well and sending you some calming waves and a hug. X
Posts.Title: It's confirmed.....cancer

Posts.Content: Smashing. Still waiting for mine. Had it last Friday xxx
Posts.Title: 1st Mammogram

Posts.Content: Good discription. It's a really  good feeling to fish chemo.  All the best for rest of treatments.
Posts.Title: Final chemo done.... woohoo!!

Posts.Title: Result of first mammogram today ...

Posts.Content: What is' normal' a different one to before. My husband goes on that I need to loose weight.  ( yes I do) but he says I need to go on a drastic diet. Which drives me mad. X I just smile and say 'yes dear'
Posts.Title: Getting back to "normal"

Posts.Content: Hi I too feel tired I did go back to work then had more surgery 6th October. Replacement expander and breast reduction other side .At the moment I do anything and am shattered.  When i went back to work last time it took me a couple of myths not to feel as tired.  I would come home sit down and go to sleep Think the tablets make you feel tired as well I had mastectomy September 2014+reconstruction. The chemo which finished in March.  Sending a hug. Keep going  I found d the looking good feeling good session was really fun and learned how to put make up on it was held at local. Cancer support in skiptonq
Posts.Title: Breast cancer recovery

Posts.Content: Hi I too feel tired I did go back to work then had more surgery 6th October. Replacement expander and breast reduction other side .At the moment I do anything and am shattered.  When i went back to work last time it took me a couple of myths not to feel as tired.  I would come home sit down and go to sleep Think the tablets make you feel tired as well I had mastectomy September 2014+reconstruction. Posts.Title: Breast cancer recovery

Posts.Content: Hi I didn't like the adverts either.  Used to turn the telly over the one about sitting alone. Was bad. But it's a way of getting the message across. Be strong keep going. X
Posts.Title: Adverts!!

Posts.Content: I shaved my head got 3 different coloured wigs. So changed colours on how I felt. Am now 5 months post chemo my hair is growing back. X
Posts.Title: Hair Loss

Posts.Content: Hi I had mastectomy and implant. It felt good waking up and having a cleavage. Hours are you? It feels a little strange at first. Any problems go back to surgeon Sending a hug.
Posts.Title: Mastectomy and Implant

Posts.Content: Hi  Was thinking of trying this but think I have read that it has properties in it that are not good for us that have had bc I can't find where I read it though.

Posts.Content: It was written on the report from the consultant when I went back  after the mastectomy to get biopsy results. X
